components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: VEHICLE ENGINE IDLES TOO HIGH WHEN VEHICLE IS MOVING (OK AFTER VEHICLE IS STOPPED FOR OVER 10 SECONDS).  THIS MAKES STOPPING VEHICLE VERY DIFFICULT.  HAVE TO THROW VEHICLE INTO NEUTRAL AND LET ENGINE RACE WHEN STOPPING.  BRAKING DISTANCE GREATLY INCREASED, HAD MANY CLOSE CALLS, AND A MINOR CRASH WITH DAMAGE.  DEALER ATTEMPTED TO CORRECT 3 TIMES AND BEEN TO 2 OTHER MECHANICS.  PROBLEM STILL PERSISTS.*AK

MY GMC SAFARI 1993 MODEL WAS PARKED IN THE SAME SPOT AS USUAL IN FRONT OF MY HOME AND HAD NOT BEEN DRIVEN SINCE THE EVENING BEFORE. WE WERE AWAKEN  BY SIRENS FROM A FIRE TRUCK AND THE VAN WAS ENGULFED IN FLAMES COMING FROM UNDER THE HOOD THE FIRE DEPARTMENT PUT THE FIRE OUT AND WAS UNABLE TO OPEN THE HOOD EVEN WITH AXES THEY TRIED FOR AN HOUR AND GAVE UP AND SAID A FIRE INSPECTOR WOULD BE OUT TO INVESTIGATE THE CAUSE TODAY. THE FIRE CAME FROM UNDER THE DRIVERS SIDE AND THE WHOLE DASHBOARD IS MELTED AWAY TO NOTHING AND THE STEERING WHEEL WE HAVE LOST EVERYTHING DUE TO THIS FIRE. THE WHOLE FRONT INTERIOR IS MELTED AWAY TOO. THE FIREMEN SMELLED SULFUR WHILE PUTTING IT OUT AND STILL SMELLED IT AFTER THE FIRE WAS OUT TOO. I NEED TO KNOW WHAT TO DO ABOUT THIS I HAVE SENT GMC A REPORT ON THEIR WEBSITE ABOUT THIS AS A COMPLAINT AND SHOULD HEAR FROM THEM WITHIN 48 HOURS. PLEASE CONTACT ME IF I SHOULD DO ANYTHING ELSE ABOUT THIS. *JB

WHILE TRAVELING THROUGH HEAVY RAINS IN THE SF BAY AREA MY WINDSHIELD WIPERS WOULD STOP AND REQUIRED A PHYSICAL PUSH TO RESTART.  THIS CAUSED ME TO HAVE TO BLINDLY MAKE MY WAY TO THE SIDE OF THE FREEWAY AND STOP TO RESTART THE WIPERS.  I HAD THE WIPER UNIT REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY BEFORE THE 03023 RECALL. THE PROBLEMS REAPPEARED LATER AND THOUGH THEY ARE THE SAME AS THOSE REPORTED FOR THE 94-98 RECALL, MY '93 C2500 IS NOT COVERED. NUMEROUS OTHER REPORTS ON YOUR WEBSITE INDICATE THIS WAS A '93 PROBLEM AS WELL. PLEASE INCLUDE THESE VEHICLES IN THE RECALL BEFORE SOMEONE IS KILLED - IF THERE HAVE NOT ALREADY BEEN RELATED DEATHS.    THERE IS NO RESOLUTION TO THIS FOR US WHEN WE HAVE TO PAY CHEVY TO FIX THE PROBLEM WITH ANOTHER DEFECTIVE PART!    PS. THIS IS THE 2ND ENTRY I'VE MADE TO YOUR WEBSITE. I FORCES ME TO CHOOSE A HEAVY VEHICLE MODEL TRUCK AND DOES NOT SHOW THE LIGHT VEHICLE SELECTION AS PER THE INSTRUCTIONS. ALSO, THE LEAD IN PAGE INDICATES YOU CAN CALL AND YOUR REPORT WILL BE RECORDED VIA PHONE BUT AFTER A  L O N G  SERIES OF INSTRUCTIONS YOU ARE ULTIMATELY ONLY GIVEN THE OPTION TO RECORD YOUR ADDRESS FOR A CARD TO BE SENT IN 2 WEEKS.  IT IS MISLEADING. *JB
